scripts.start-database-service: powershell.exe -Command "if ((Get-Service MySQL8.0.21).Status -eq 'Stopped') {try{Write-Host 'Starting service MySQL8.0.21...'; Start-Service 'MySQL8.0.21' -ErrorAction Stop; Write-Host 'Service MySQL8.0.21 started.'}catch{Write-Host 'Service start failed. Try running Command Prompt as administrator.' -ForegroundColor Red}}"
scripts.check-database-service: powershell.exe -Command "Get-Service MySQL8.0.21 | Format-List -Property Name, DisplayName, Status, StartType"
scripts.start: npm run start-database-service & npm run start-server
